body.description: Medicine flavoring for bad tasting medication for children,kids and any other age group.Your child will finally be able to swallow a less bitter and sweetened medication eliminating the gagging and vomiting process. If the supplements you child take take taste and smell bad, Flavor+ can improve both. Our products are flavoring drops of choice for yucky antibiotics like augmentin, penicillin ,bitter medications syrups like prednisolone, zantac or ranitidine or allergy medicines like zyrtec syrup. Our 1 oz amber dropper glass size vial allow for multiple servings and safe storage conditions ( no vinyl no plastics!) . Flavor+ eliminates the multiple trips to the pharmacy to flavor your kids medicines and makes it convenient for parents to take control of their kids medications from home. We use a natural sweetener instead of the artificial ones seen on the market which makes it also ideal for diabetic children . Our product can also be added to flavor a variety of foods and beverages from water to sauces yogurt or smoothies. Its has been proven that kids compliance with medicines improves drastically once you improve the bad taste of their medication and make it more palatable. Our products are FDA registered, HACCP certified and all flavor ingredients are on FEMA list. Expiration date : 10/2024 Limited Quantity Available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2016
reviews.reviewText: My son has epilepsy his medication is horrible. Try to get a 4yr old to swallow a pill. Sprinkle it in food they recommend, well that just makes my son not want to eat. Found flavor drops on a blog decided to order it here on Amazon. Works wonders a little water, med, and a drop or two works miracles
